case.title: The main page should be opened after tapping the “Huntd” logo
The "For engineers" screen should be active after tapping the "Huntd" logo

The screen should be swiped to the top after tapping the UP arrow

The "Candidate’s card" should contain [START CHAT] button
The "Candidate’s card" should contain technical skills tags
User should be redirected to the "Candidate's profile" screen after tapping technical skill tag

User should be redirected to the "Candidate's profile" screen after tapping considering roles tag
Candidate’s card should be expanded to a full description after tapping on "SHOW EXPERIENCE" option
Candidate’s card should be minimized to a short description after tapping on "HIDE EXPERIENCE" option

The "PROFILE * ACTIVE" label should be displayed in the header of the Candidate’s profile for activated account
The "PROFILE * INACTIVE" label should be displayed in the header of the Candidate’s profile for unactivated account
The "CV AND CONTACTS ARE HIDDEN" warning message should cover the contacts section

The header of the “For Engineers” screen should contain the "SIGN IN" link

The “For Engineers” screen should contain the [GET OFFERS] button
User should be redirected to the "Sign up" screen after tapping [GET OFFERS] button
User should be redirected to the Google accounts after tapping [Google] button
User should be redirected to the LinkedIn account after tapping [LinkedIn] button
User should be redirected to the GitHub account after tapping [GitHub] button
Users should be able to sign in by entering valid date in "Email" and "Password" fields
Users should be able to sign in without delay by entering valid date in "Email" and "Password" fields
Users should not be able to sign in by entering valid email with a space in the "Email" field
Users should not be able to sign in by entering invalid email in the "Email" field
Users should not be able to sign in by entering invalid password in the "Password" field
Users should not be able to sign in by leaving "Email" field empty
Users should not be able to sign in by leaving "Password" field empty
Users should not be able to sign in by leaving "Email" and "Password" fields empty
Users should be redirected to the "Sign up" screen to create new account by tapping in the "Sign up" link
Users should be able to sign in after changing password
Users should not be able to sign in by entering valid password with a space in the "Password" field
The font of the Sign In screen should be as per the standard
The text of the Sign In screen should be as per the standard
The text color of the Sign In screen should be as per the standard
The entered password in the Password field must be hidden with asterisks
Elements in the screen should be properly aligned
Content of the screen should be adjusted appropriately
Users should not be able to sign in by entering valid password in uppercase in the "Password" field
Password eye should be disabled by default in the "Password" field
Users should be able to sign in with Google by tapping on the [Google] button
Users should be able to sign in with Linkedin by tapping on the [Linkedin] button
Users should be able to sign in with GitHub by tapping on the [GitHub ] button

The "Password" field should be highlighted red with the message "Password required" after trying to register with an unfilled password

The "Repeat Password" field should be highlighted red with the message "Please make sure your passwords match" after trying to register with unmatched passwords
The data in the "Password" field must be covered by asterisks
The data in the "Repeat Password" field must be covered by asterisks

"HIring management" screen should contain "Message Templates" tab
Recruiters should be redirected to the "Candidates" screen after typping on the [Search engineers] button in the "Hirings " tab
The text color of the "Hirings" tab should be as per the standard
Elements in the "Hirings " tab should be properly aligned
Content of the "Hirings" tab should be adjusted appropriately
"Connections " should contain list of candidates if recruiters had some connections
The text color of the "Connections " tab should be as per the standard
Elements in the "Connections" tab should be properly aligned
Content of the "Connections " tab should be adjusted appropriately
"Subscriptions " should contain vacancies created by the recruiter
Recruiters should be redirected to the "Candidates" screen and see candidate profiles which are suitable for vacancy after tapping on the [View candidates] button in the "Subscriptions" tab
Recruiters should be able to delete added vacancy by tapping on the [Unsubscribe] button in the "Subscriptions" tab
The text color of the "Subscriptions " tab should be as per the standard
Elements in the "Subscriptions" tab should be properly aligned
Content of the "Subscriptions " tab should be adjusted appropriately
"Message template" form should appear after tapping on the [Add a message template] button in the "Message templates" tab
Recruiters should be able to add title in the "Template title" field in the "Message template" form
Recruiters should be able to add text in the "Message" field in the "Message template" form
Recruiters should be able to add new message template by tapping on the [Save] button in the "Message template" form
Recruiters should be able to cancel changes by tapping on the [Cancel] button in the "Message template" form
The text color of the "Message templates " tab should be as per the standard
Elements in the "Message templates " tab should be properly aligned
Content of the "Message templates" tab should be adjusted appropriately
Recruiters should be able to connect Linkedin by tapping on the [Linkedin] button on the "Social profiles" screen
Recruiters should be able to connect GitHub by tapping on the [GitHub] button on the "Social profiles" screen
Recruiters should be able to connect Google by tapping on the [Google] button on the "Social profiles" screen
"Change password" screen with "Current password", "New password" and "Repeat new password" fields should appear after tapping on the [Change password] button
Entered data should be indentical in the "New password" and "Repeat new password" fields
Candidates should not be able to change password by enter invalid password in the "Current password" field
The entered password in the "Change password" field should be hidden with asterisks
The entered password in the "New password" field should be hidden with asterisks
The entered password in the "Repeat new password" field should be hidden with asterisks
The text color of the "Change password " screen should be as per the standard
Elements in the "Change password" screen should be properly aligned
Content of the "Change password " screen should be adjusted appropriately
Recruiters should be redirected to the "Candidates" screen by tapping on the "Candidates" link in the Profile
Recruiters should be redirected to the "Web3 companies and Jobs" screen by tapping on the "Jobs" link in the Profile
Recruiters should be able to sign out by tapping on the "Sign out" link in the "Profile"
"Sign out" link should be visible
User should be able to open “Chats” screen by tapping “Chats” link in the header
Contacts of the candidate should be hidden before candidate shares it
User is able to edit message by tapping on the "Edit" tooltip
User should be able to delete message
User should be able to Archive chat by tapping "Archive" link in kebab menu in Chat List
User should be able to Delete chat by tapping "Delete" link in kebab menu in Chat List
User should not be able to send blank message
User is not able to send message with unprinted characters
The "0/10" counter should be displayed in the center of the screen on the blank chat section
A counter of active chats should be displayed at the bottom of the chat list
User is not able to add file to the message
User should be redirected to the "ARCHIVE" tab after tapping on the "ARCHIVE" link
User should be redirected to the chat list screen after tapping on the back arrow on the active chat screen
User is able to copy message from the chat
The chat list should be refreshed after a swipe down
The chat should be moved to the top of the chat list after sending a message
The online status of the chat partner should be displayed on the right of the chat name
User should be redirected to the profile screen after tapping on the user avatar
The avatar of a candidate with closed contacts should be displayed as a lock
Recruiter should be able to initiate a chat with a candidate on the “Candidate profile” screen by tapping [SEND MESSAGE] button
Recruiter should be able to initiate a chat with a candidate on the “List of candidates” by tapping [START CHAT] button
Recruiter should be able to send the offer to the candidate by tapping "Hire candidate" link in kebab menu
Recruiter should be able to mark the chat as rejected by tapping "Reject candidate" link in kebab menu
"Job" page should contain Cards of vacancies
User should be able to filter vacancies by tapping on "skill" link
User should be able to expand job description information by tapping on "Job details"
User should be able to collapse job description information by tapping on "Job details"
Twenty more vacancies cards should appear after tapping on [VIEW 20 MORE]
"Jobs" page should contain "Vacancies subscription" form
User should be able to post a new job by tapping [POST A JOB] and then tapping "Add a job manually"
User should be able to post a new job by tapping [POST A JOB] and then tapping "Import jobs from ATS"

section.name: Stay on top of web3 jobs

case.title: User should be able to subscribe to vacancies by filling the form and tapping [RECIEVE JOBS]
User should be able to select role by tapping on the "Desired roles" field and then tapping on the role from the list
User should be able to type the first letters of the role in the "Desired roles" field and then choose the role from the list by tapping on it
User should be able to select experience by tapping on the "Your experience" field and then tapping on the any item from the list
User should be able to choose the desired annual salary by moving the slider
Footer should contain the “TOP 100 WEB3 COMPANIES” with a preview of the top 5 companies
User should be redirected to the “TOP 100 WEB3 COMPANIES” page after tapping on [VIEW TOP 100]
Footer should contain 3 columns of vacancies for web3 developers
Footer should contain link to the "LinkedIn" social network
Footer should contain link to the "Twitter" social network
Footer should contain link to the "Telegram" social network
Footer should contain link to the "Signal" social network
Footer should contain link to the "Instagram" social network
Footer should contain link to the "Facebook" social network
Footer should contain "pricing" link
Footer should contain "FAQ" link
Footer should contain "About us" link
Footer should contain "Terms of use" link
Footer should contain "Cookies policy" link
Footer should contain "Privacy policy" link
